featured.text: They found that the sick plants could “sneeze” and 23 tiny water drops filled with leaf rust germs, spreading the disease to neighboring plants.
Some religious groups organize special healing shrines for the sick.
Getting a flu shot before the start of flu season gives our body a chance to build up protection against the that could make us sick.
You may also get sick from playing video games, or looking through a microscope.
Feeling quite sick with fear, I sat on the driver’s seat, trying to stop trembling.

other.text: The Carnegie Medal is given to those who are (A) sick and poor.
According to the passage, what type of people are more likely to get well sooner when they get sick? 2.
The profits of Prince Charles’s organic farm go to _____ to help the poor and the sick.
Furthermore, elephants are known to resist leaving their sick or dying behind, and a herd may linger at a trench with a trapped baby for hours, reluctant to move on until all hope is lost.
Your brain’s confused reaction makes you feel sick.

definition.en_def: Affected by physical or mental illness.
definition.example: She stayed home from school because she was feeling sick.
